name: Virtual Reality Experiment Framework
description: VREF is a framework for academic experiments in virtual reality. Download now and take part in academic experiments to aid VR research. The current project aims to assess the technical feasibility of teaching fire training in rural areas.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space
